document.full_text: richard branson's plan to save the ring-tailed lemurs by importing them to the british virgin islands has not been met with wholesale support by scientists and environmentalists.
document.title: branson: a man with an island for lemurs
lines_and_colors: richard branson's plan to save the ring-tailed lemurs by importing them to the british virgin islands has not been met with wholesale support by scientists and environmentalists.
